page.title: 05THE CHURCH OF TIBBERTON 2
page.content:
{EVENTS}-There is 1 service a week,held on a Sunday-Holy Communion with hymns or Morning Prayer.Every 2 months,8 parishes meet for a Family Service. There used to be a Sunday School but it only lasted for a year as Droitwich Rugby Club opened and the children joined.The vicar feels that there are not enough children.Many of them go to discos or the Young Farmers Club.
{ATTENDANCE}-The congregation number has stayed the same over the years, with a congregation of about 20. The majority are aged 45 to 50 and all of them come from Tibberton.The church is never locked.So far it has not suffered vandalism.The vicar tells us that the church is the centre of the village-it helps people to find God.
